99-0482 (La. 4/1/99)

Billy Cord STUART v. VALLEY ELECTRIC MEMBERSHIP CORPORATION, et al. No. 99-C-0482. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 1, 1999.

IN RE: Stuart, Billy Cord; — Plaintiff(s); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review; Parish of Red River 39th Judicial District Court Number 29,994; to the Court of Appeal, Second Circuit, Number 31381-CA

Denied.

TRAYLOR, J. not on panel.
